title: The Whistler (restored, colorized) (1944, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: The Whistler (restored, colorized) (1944, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: The Whistler is a 1944 American  mystery film   noir  directed by  William Castle  and starring  Richard Dix ,  Gloria Stuart  and  J. Carrol Naish . Based on the  radio drama   The Whistler , it was the first of  Columbia Pictures ' eight " Whistler " films starring Richard Dix produced in the 1940s.
